WHOS more findable, can schema.org be used</p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;">10. <b><font color="#0f662f">S<span style="background-color: initial;">olidify the/focus on architecture with historical/near realtime</span></font></b></p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;"><b><span style="background-color: initial;"><font color="#000033">11. Systems used by data producers (&nbsp;</p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 51, 102), rgb(161, 205, 249));">i.e People,&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 51, 102), rgb(161, 205, 249));">Institutions,&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 51, 102), rgb(161, 205, 249));">Systems)</span></p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;">2. They include: Database systems,&nbsp;</p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 51, 102), rgb(161, 205, 249));">FTP Site,&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 51, 102), rgb(161, 205, 249));">Data collection platforms,&nbsp;</span></p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 51, 102), rgb(161, 205, 249));">Web site</span></p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;">3. DAB (Data Access Broker)&nbsp; and Ontology;&nbsp;</span></p><p style="color: rgb(0, 51, 102); margin: 0px 0px 0px 8px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">&nbsp; &nbsp; DABO</span></p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;"><span style="background-color: initial; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">DAB:&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: initial; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><b>is&nbsp;</b></span><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><b>a brokering platform that mediates&nbsp;</b></span><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">WHOS data&nbsp;</b><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">publishing system&nbsp;</b></p><p style="margin: 0px; margin-left: 8px;"><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">(WHOS Node</b><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">) and&nbsp;</b><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">WHOS&nbsp;</b><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">data&nbsp;&nbsp;</b><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">consumer systems</b><b style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">.
